comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This was the second annual conference of the Association. Meetings were held at the Hotel Astor in New York City, on September 25 and 26, 1911. Under the heading, "To Discuss Foreign Trade," a short item appeared in the New York Times on September 25: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9902E6D91131E2... The New York Times story on the conference proceedings (September 26, 1911) was headlined "Exporters Prepare a World Campaign": query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B0DE1D81531E2... The next day's New York Times carried a report of discussion about prospects of trade with South America -- and cultural differences that called for greater sensitivity on the part of North American would-be exporters: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9403E3D91131E2...
